question: I am pregnant right now. Is it safe for me to pray in the normal way? Can there be any harm to the baby if I go into Sajda ...
answer:
QUESTION
Can i pray normally? Or should i ask my doctor? I am pregnant right now. Is it safe for me to pray in the normal way? Can there be any harm to the baby if I go into Sajda as my stomach gets pressed too much. Jazak Allah
ANSWER


Share:
You should consult your doctor and follow his/her advise.

In principle, if it is harmful to go into Sajdah, then you may sit and perform Salaat and make Sajdah through Ishaarah (indication).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
